summary: Project to create an AI (details not yet specified).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal geometric “assistant” logo mark with subtle circuit/brain motif, warm neutral palette (ai-mark.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Build an MVP “AI assistant” experience as a chat-style UI that answers users using a user-managed knowledge base (FAQ-style entries) and simple keyword matching (no external AI/LLM APIs).
Create a Knowledge Base management screen in the React frontend to add/edit/delete knowledge entries and view all existing entries.
Add an authenticated app shell with navigation between Chat and Knowledge Base, and ensure unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in with Internet Identity.

Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (color palette, typography, spacing, component styling) suitable for a productivity “assistant” tool; avoid default-looking styling and avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Generate and include a simple app logo/mark as a static asset and display it in the app header/login view.

new_feature_requests.summary: Define requirements and scope for the AI to be created (purpose, platform, capabilities).
Implement backend persistence in Motoko for knowledge entries and chat history per authenticated user (Internet Identity), including CRUD operations for knowledge entries.

projectName: Create MVP “AI” app as a rule-based knowledge assistant (no external LLM)
